author: nestauk (https://www.nesta.org.uk/)
description: Svizzle Atlas contains geographic boundaries for mapping.
name: @svizzle/atlas

scripts.pipeline: npm run setup && npm run process && npm run dist
scripts.bumppack: npm run setprerelease && npm run pack
scripts.pack: mkdirp pkg && rimraf pkg/* && dirname=${PWD##*/} && tar -cvz -f pkg/${npm_package_config_name}@${npm_package_version}.tar.gz -C .. ${dirname}/dist/ ${dirname}/LICENSE ${dirname}/README.md ${dirname}/package.json
scripts.uploadPack: curbranch=$(git branch --show-current) && echo $curbranch && pkgName=${npm_package_config_name}@${npm_package_version}.tar.gz && cp pkg/${pkgName} ../../../ && git checkout pkgs && git add ../../../$pkgName && git commit -m $pkgName && git push && git checkout -f $curbranch
